comment: Correction: Democratic Socialists use government to weaken the people to build dependency on the state. National Socialists use government to strengthen the people to build independence from the state.
amr:
# ::snt Correction: Democratic Socialists use government to weaken the people to build dependency on the state. National Socialists use government to strengthen the people to build independence from the state.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / correct-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 (p / political-party
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Democratic"
                              :op2 "Socialist"))
                  :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
                  :ARG2 (w / weaken-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person)
                        :purpose (b / build-02
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :ARG1 (d / depend-01
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG0 p2
                                    :ARG1 (s / state))))))
      :snt2 (u2 / use-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / political-party
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "National"
                        :op2 "Socialist"))
            :ARG1 g
            :ARG2 (s2 / strengthen-01
                  :ARG0 p3
                  :ARG1 (p4 / people)
                  :purpose (b2 / build-02
                        :ARG0 p4
                        :ARG1 d
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 p4
                        :ARG1 s))))

comment: They repeat it out of context endlessly. Gets old, if I were quoting something to my opponents and someone said something was wrong with the quote, I'd check. I care about being correct and will change according to the facts. What's wrong with the average NPC?
